text.div:
Supply Risk Codes

Code Description Nederlands (Dutch) Comment Version
COR Corrosive Corrosief Material is corrosive and may cause severe injury to skin, mucous membranes and eyes. Avoid any unprotected contact. added v2.6
EXP Explosive Explosief Material is an explosive mixture. Keep away from fire, sparks, and heat. added v2.6
FLA Flammable Brandbaar Material is highly flammable and in certain mixtures (with air) may lead to explosions. Keep away from fire, sparks and excessive heat. added v2.6
INJ Injury Hazard Letselgevaar Material is solid and sharp (e.g. cannulas.) Dispose in hard container. added v2.6
RAD Radioactive Radioactief Material is a source for ionizing radiation and must be handled with special care to avoid injury of those who handle it and to avoid environmental hazards. added v2.6
TOX Toxic Toxisch Material is toxic to humans and/or animals. Special care must be taken to avoid incorporation, even of small amounts. added v2.6
UNK Unknown Onbekend Material hazard level is unknown. added v2.6

name: v2 Supply Risk Codes
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0871 ( Supply Risk Codes)

extension.valueString: Material is corrosive and may cause severe injury to skin, mucous membranes and eyes. Avoid any unprotected contact.
Material is an explosive mixture.  Keep away from fire, sparks, and heat.
Material is highly flammable and in certain mixtures (with air) may lead to explosions.  Keep away from fire, sparks and excessive heat.
Material is solid and sharp (e.g. cannulas.)  Dispose in hard container.
Material is a source for ionizing radiation and must be handled with special care to avoid injury of those who handle it and to avoid environmental hazards.
Material is toxic to humans and/or animals.  Special care must be taken to avoid incorporation, even of small amounts.
